description: These luxury Boxer Briefs feature an ultra-soft, breathable, lightweight TENCEL™ Modal that is sustainably sourced, guaranteed to stay smooth and keep you comfortably supported at all times.<br><br>The Original 3D Pouch lifts and supports everything, eliminating the need to shift or adjust.
name: Classic Boxer Brief - Mens

specs.value: All BN3TH fabrics are soft and made from a performance stretch fabric. If your measurements are between sizes, select a larger size for a looser fit or a smaller size for a tighter fit
